Text: Looks fine, but language is Polish. It is listed as such but I missed it :P This is just an extra heads-up if you are looking for an English version.
If it's in Polish why did you upload this ? For Polish people ? Who gives a fuck about something which is in ...Polish ?

It's listed as LP, as if people know what that means. If it's not in English, tell us from the beginning. Some people don't actually read the comments or open the description link, they just click the arrow to download the torrent.
